short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-Button Screenshot extension for Chrome web browser. Simply click the extension icon in your Chrome browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Screenshot for Google Chrome is an easy-to-use, free extension for screen capturing on both Mac and Windows.

— Save the screenshot to a file or to the clipboard
— Save the screenshot in PNG or JPEG format
— Take screenshots quickly using a hotkey
